description:
Snack Moms is going on today. Today`s theme is "it sounds unbelievable but it`s true". The moms start to stories about their children that seem really unbelievable but are true, and when it kept going...; Recently Bunji has started to selfishly tell lies. When Mom asks him why, he says it`s fun. At first, Mom was fed up with him, but eventually she got angry...; By coincidence, the two of them, Dad and Ai, Mom`s assistant, were left at home. While Ai was busy working, Dad goes to extremes to try and provide service to her; Fumi said that she will make Mommy`s lunch. When Mom looks at her cooking as well as preparing, Mom senses her growing, and while Mom is really happy with that...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: True / Lies / Older Man`s Modesty / The Smile on a Rainy Day
ホント / うそうそ / オヤジのたしなみ / 雨の日の笑顔
